resources.string:
Instructions:

- Use the correct username/password sent to your registered mobile for logging in to your account. 
 - If you have forgotten your password or username, click on the forgot password link and enter your registered mobile number. 
 - If you are not registered with our portal, click the Register 
 link and follows the instructions listed there.
 - If you want to login with your registered mobile without the password, click the link Login with OTP and follow the instructions listed there.
Search job according to your profile in rozgar mela
